name: Puzzlums
description:
Can you solve these brain-training puzzles and level up your neurons? It’s time to test your mind-power in Puzzlums. Download the app and play logic games, brainteasers, memory puzzles and more!

In Puzzlums, you’ll enter a world of exciting mini-puzzle games that will keep you entertained for hours. Do you have the patience and skill to win? It’s time to find out! Use your mind and beat the puzzle master game.
